author: ltheussl
msg: Adding a linkchecking tool. For now it's just a simple adaptation of the m1 linkcheck plugin (r535801) to make it usable stand-alone, adjusted code conventions, added javadocs. Needs some clean up and testing.

author: dennisl
msg: o Add INFO level logging to let the user know what the plugin is doing. If something fails during the coping we don't want to ask the user to rerun the plugin with debugging turned on.

author: elecharny
msg: Fixed DIRSERVER-853 : added some checks in the isReferral() method
